author: achapman
title: Manchester United star Marcus Rashford urged to take advantage of Zlatan Ibrahimovic’s suspension by club legend Gary Neville

organizations.name: efl make your marc manchester united

text:
EFL Make Your Marc Manchester United star Marcus Rashford urged to take advantage of Zlatan Ibrahimovic’s suspension by club legend Gary Neville 
Gary Neville hopes young England ace can deliver the goods as veteran Swede sits out another game after three-match ban By Anthony Chapman 17th March 2017, 11:47 pm Updated: 17th March 2017, 11:51 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MARCUS RASHFORD has been urged to take advantage of Zlatan Ibrahimovic’s suspension when he leads the line for Manchester United this weekend. 
Former Red Devil and TV pundit Gary Neville reckons the youngster has failed to hit the heights of last season but now has the chance to prove his worth against Middlesbrough on Sunday. Reuters 3 Marcus Rashford has been urged to grab his chance in the Man Utd first-team with both hands 
Rashford famously burst into the scene as a fresh-faced academy starlet under Louis van Gaal in 2016 but has found opportunities as a central striker limited under Jose Mourinho . Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester United news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The England international has mainly been deployed as a left winger and has seen the goals dry up as a result. 
But Neville feels Rashford can now remind everyone of his talents against Boro this weekend, with the teen set to fill in for Ibrahimovic as the Swede serves the second game of his three-match suspension. Sunday Premier League match preview featuring Man City v Liverpool PA:Press Association 3 Gary Neville feels Rashford's form has taken a dip this season 
Neville told Omnisport : “[Rashford] is not getting overplayed, he is able to learn at a more calm pace. 
“The bad is that at times maybe his form hasn’t been as good as it was last season. He needs to reproduce that standard he set last season. MOST READ IN SPORT MIDFIELD ENGINE N'Golo Kante drives around in a modest Mini as Chelsea team-mates collect supercars... and we can reveal why QUICK DRAW Leicester await quarter-final draw where they could meet Barcelona, Real Madrid or Bayern Munich gunner stay? Arsene Wenger drops hint he will stay at Arsenal beyond the summer by taking interest in academy project uefa go bananas Manchester United star Marcos Rojo drug tested after eating a banana in win over Rostov BOUT TO HAPPEN Floyd Mayweather hoping to fight Conor McGregor in June as he waits for UFC star to 'sign papers' Quarter rounders When is the Champions League quarter-final draw, how can I watch it and which teams are in it? Getty Images 3 Rashford is set to lead the line against Middlesbrough in place of suspended Zlatan Ibrahimovic 
“There’s potentially always going to be a fall in a young player. There is going to be ups and downs and inconsistency. Maybe now, he has a chance to show what he is. He can have confidence knowing he will play. 
“It’s good that they’re not relying upon him in every single game, but in some ways he needs to stand up and take the opportunity.”
